testcase.name: ankh-button > default rendering > renders with filled variant by default
ankh-button > default rendering > renders with medium size by default
ankh-button > default rendering > renders with type="button" by default
ankh-button > default rendering > renders host with ankh-btn-host class
ankh-button > default rendering > renders content wrapper span
ankh-button > sub-components > includes ankh-focus-ring
ankh-button > sub-components > includes ankh-ripple
ankh-button > sub-components > propagates disabled state to ankh-ripple
ankh-button > sub-components > does not disable ripple when button is enabled
ankh-button > slot content > renders text content in slot
ankh-button > variant prop > applies ankh-btn--filled class for variant="undefined"
ankh-button > variant prop > applies ankh-btn--outlined class for variant="undefined"
ankh-button > variant prop > applies ankh-btn--text class for variant="undefined"
ankh-button > variant prop > applies ankh-btn--elevated class for variant="undefined"
ankh-button > variant prop > applies ankh-btn--tonal class for variant="undefined"
ankh-button > size prop > applies ankh-btn--small class for size="undefined"
ankh-button > size prop > applies ankh-btn--medium class for size="undefined"
ankh-button > size prop > applies ankh-btn--large class for size="undefined"
ankh-button > type prop > sets type="button" on native button
ankh-button > type prop > sets type="submit" on native button
ankh-button > type prop > sets type="reset" on native button
ankh-button > disabled prop > disables native button when disabled="true"
ankh-button > disabled prop > enables native button when disabled is not set
ankh-button > full-width prop > applies full-width class when full-width="true"
ankh-button > full-width prop > does not apply full-width class by default
ankh-ripple > rendering > sets aria-hidden="true" for accessibility
ankh-ripple > rendering > renders surface element with ankh-ripple class
ankh-ripple > rendering > reflects disabled attribute when set
ankh-ripple > hover behavior > adds hovered class on pointerenter
ankh-ripple > hover behavior > removes hovered class on pointerleave
ankh-ripple > hover behavior > does not add hovered class when disabled
ankh-ripple > press behavior (mouse/pen) > adds pressed class on pointerdown
ankh-ripple > press behavior (mouse/pen) > does not respond to non-primary pointer
ankh-ripple > press behavior (mouse/pen) > does not add pressed class when disabled
ankh-ripple > press behavior (mouse/pen) > calls animate API when pressed
ankh-ripple > press behavior (touch) > does not immediately press on touch (has delay)
ankh-ripple > press behavior (touch) > resets state on pointercancel
ankh-ripple > click behavior > does not add pressed class on click when disabled
ankh-ripple > click behavior > handles keyboard activation (click without pointer) without error
ankh-ripple > context menu > resets hover state on contextmenu
ankh-ripple > context menu > cancels animation on contextmenu
ankh-ripple > lifecycle > detaches listeners on disconnect
ankh-focus-ring > rendering > sets aria-hidden="true" for accessibility
ankh-focus-ring > rendering > renders ring element with ankh-focus-ring class
ankh-focus-ring > rendering > ring is not visible by default
ankh-focus-ring > visible prop > shows ring when visible="true"
ankh-focus-ring > visible prop > reflects visible attribute on host
ankh-focus-ring > inward prop > applies inward class when inward="true"
ankh-focus-ring > inward prop > reflects inward attribute on host
ankh-focus-ring > inward prop > does not apply inward class by default
ankh-focus-ring > focus behavior > hides ring on focusout
ankh-focus-ring > focus behavior > hides ring on pointerdown
ankh-focus-ring > focus behavior > shows ring on focusin when parent matches :focus-visible
ankh-focus-ring > focus behavior > does not show ring on focusin when parent does not match :focus-visible
ankh-focus-ring > lifecycle > detaches listeners on disconnect
